name: Firewall_Traffic_Logs
pattern: .*?end_time="(?P<final_ts>.*?)" duration="(?P<duration>.*?)" .*?src_ip=(?P<src_ip>.*?) user_id=(?P<user_id>.*?) src_port=(?P<src_port>\d+) dst_ip=(?P<dst_ip>.*?) dst_port=(?P<dst_port>\d+) protocol=(?P<protocol>.*?) app_name=(?P<action>.*?) packets_total=(?P<packets_total>\d+) bytes_total=(?P<bytes_total>\d+)
